instructions: Open the Home app and tap Add Accessory . Use the camera on your iOS device to scan the eight-digit HomeKit code or QR code that came with your lights. When your accessory appears, tap it. If asked to Add Accessory to Network , tap Allow . Name your accessory and assign it to a room to help you identify it in the Home app and control it with Siri . Tap Next and then Done .
Open Settings on your iPhone. Scroll down and tap Siri & Search . Make sure Listen for "Hey Siri" is toggled on so you can use your voice to control your lights.

Open the Home app. Tap the Plus (+) sign . Tap Add Scene . You now have the option to create a suggested Scene or a custom one. For this example, we'll use Arrive Hom e. Tap Arrive Home . The Scene will display all available accessories, including your smart lights. For this Scene, it recommends turning on all available lights at 70% brightness when you get home. Customize this array by disabling lights you don't want to activate. To do this, tap the lights you want the Scene to ignore, and they'll be greyed out. Next, adjust the brightness at which individual lights come on when the Scene is activated. On an iPhone with 3D Touch, press firmly until the brightness control appears. Slide up and down to adjust the brightness. On an iPhone without 3D Touch, press and hold until the brightness control appears. Slide up and down to adjust the brightness. Once set, you'll see the lights that are set up and their predetermined brightness levels. Tap Done to finalize your scene. On the main Home screen, you'll now see Arrive Home listed as a Favorite Scene . Tap it once to run it. Exit the Home app, open Settings , then scroll down and tap Siri & Search . Tap All Shortcuts . Scroll down until you see the suggested shortcuts for Home. Tap Run Arrive Home . You'll now be asked to record a Siri launch phrase to run the Scene. Tap the red record icon to record your phrase. Record your launch phrase. Once you've recorded your launch phrase and are satisfied, tap Done . Launch Siri and say, " Run arrive home ." Siri will activate the scene, and you can enjoy your lighting.
